components.class: justify-content-start  col-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-xl-12 d-flex align-items-center
components.name: col46

click.code:
${dsoBenutzer.FilterTextbausteinArtCode} = null
${dsoBenutzer.FilterKursNr} = null
${dsoBenutzer.FilterTitelUndText} = null
${dsoBenutzer.FilterAutorNr} = null
${dsoBenutzer.FilterThemaNummer} = null
${dsoBenutzer.FilterAnrede} = null
${dsoBenutzer.FilterDokument} = null

parameters.name: strMeldung
parameters.value: "Soll der Textbaustein '" + ${dsoTextbausteine.TitelTextbaustein} + "' gelöscht (in den Papierkorb) werden?"

components.content:
<editor
  [(ngModel)]="strTextbausteinHTML"
  apiKey="7uaxcp1fzfppm9wca8ei2hnuuf9hv2fl9slezwr9k33gv0pp"
  [init]="{
    height: 699,
    menubar: true,
    statusbar: false,
    language: 'de',
    browser_spellcheck: true,
    plugins: [
      'fullpage advlist autolink lists link image charmap print preview anchor',
      'searchreplace visualblocks code fullscreen',
      'insertdatetime media table paste code help wordcount'
    ],
    style_formats_merge: false,
    style_formats: [
      {title: 'HK Standard', inline: 'span', styles: { 'font-family': 'Arial', 'font-size': '11pt'}},    
      {title: 'HK Überschrift', inline: 'span', styles: { 'font-family': 'Arial', 'font-size': '12pt', 'font-weight': 'bold'}},    
      {title: 'HK Fußnote', inline: 'span', styles: { 'font-family': 'Arial', 'font-size': '9pt'}}
    ],
    toolbar_mode: 'sliding',
    toolbar: 'undo redo | styleselect | bold italic | alignleft aligncenter alignright alignjustify | bullist numlist | fullscreen | fontselect fontsizeselect | outdent indent | forecolor backcolor | removeformat searchreplace | help',
    fontsize_formats: '8pt 9pt 10pt 11pt 12pt 14pt 16pt 18pt 24pt 36pt 48pt',
    menu: {
      file: { title: 'File', items: 'restoredraft | preview | print ' },
      edit: { title: 'Edit', items: 'undo redo | cut copy paste pastetext | selectall | searchreplace' },
      view: { title: 'View', items: 'code | visualaid visualchars visualblocks | spellchecker | preview fullscreen' },
      insert: { title: 'Insert', items: 'image link media template codesample inserttable | charmap emoticons hr | pagebreak nonbreaking anchor toc | insertdatetime' },
      format: { title: 'Format', items: 'bold italic underline strikethrough superscript subscript codeformat | formats blockformats fontformats fontsizes align lineheight | forecolor backcolor | removeformat' },
      tools: { title: 'Tools', items: 'spellchecker spellcheckerlanguage | code wordcount' },
      table: { title: 'Table', items: 'inserttable | cell row column | tableprops deletetable' },
      help: { title: 'Help', items: 'help' }
    }         
  }"
 ></editor>
components.name: htmlEditorTextbausteine
